Message:
I was saved by a lord who came
from some place called Fran
on a journey to save people.

The problem is he’s so soft,
it’s concerning...

I bet this guy thinks that all
the people vying for his help
are good people.

He’s just like that group of
pilgrims—a self-sacrificing idiot...
The type of person I can’t stand.

But, what I hate even
more than that is...

...so please use this
genius swindling witch
well, okay?
